backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with authorization checks via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two PWA-related features: adding the mobile-web-app-capable meta tag to index.html and fixing the PWA manifest icon to use properly sized PNG files instead of an .ico reference.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key details of each component, hook, utility, and type definition in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, including meta tags for mobile web app capability, theme color, Apple touch icon, and a link to the PWA manifest.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and two PNG icon entries (192x192 and 512x512) for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets on install, old cache cleanup on activate, and runtime caching of static assets while skipping auth and API requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky header with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component for the Culture task, rendering a petri-dish shape with optional completed state styling via WorkflowIconBase.
SVG workflow icon component for the Daily Summary task, rendering a tear-off calendar page with binding holes and a date number.
SVG workflow icon component for the Discharge Notes task, rendering a document with a checkmark using WorkflowIconBase.
SVG workflow icon component for the Follow-Up task, rendering a circular arrow (refresh/history) icon using WorkflowIconBase.
Renders a sun/radial SVG icon for the 'Histo' workflow step using WorkflowIconBase with the histo color token.
Renders an imaging icon using a grayscale X-ray bone image, with an optional X overlay SVG when the step is completed.
Renders a flask/beaker SVG icon for the 'Labs' workflow step using WorkflowIconBase with the labs color token.
Renders a speech bubble SVG icon for the 'PDVM Notified' workflow step using WorkflowIconBase.
Renders a document-with-plus SVG icon for the 'Surgery Report' workflow step using WorkflowIconBase.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a workflowType string to the corresponding workflow icon component.
Base SVG wrapper for workflow icons that applies consistent sizing and stroke tokens, and overlays an X when isCompleted is true.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Defines shared design tokens for workflow icons: per-type colors, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all workflow task types and provides helper functions to derive task selections, remaining items, and colors from a Task object.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Compact card component for calendar views that displays a surgery case's species icon, pet name, and clickable workflow icons that toggle task completion.
Expandable card component for a surgery case showing patient details, workflow task icons with toggle support, and edit/delete actions.
Dialog form for editing all fields of an existing surgery case including patient info, dates, species/sex, and checklist task selections.
A dialog form component for creating new surgery cases, with fields for patient info, species, sex, dates, and selectable task options. Submits data via the useCreateCase mutation hook.
The main list view for surgery cases, handling fetching, filtering by species/tasks/search, sorting, and rendering CaseCard components. Also provides access to case creation and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined SORT_OPTIONS.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), with selections persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by pending task types and a completed-tasks toggle, with state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders the selected checklist tasks for a case as clickable icon buttons that toggle task completion status.
A panel component that handles exporting cases to CSV and importing cases from a CSV file, creating or updating backend records with progress tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A React component that renders a date input field with MM/DD/YYYY auto-formatting, validation, and a calendar popover picker. Supports auto-advancing to the next field on completion and exposes the input ref via forwardRef.
Provides export and import functions for surgery cases in CSV format, handling serialization of dates and booleans, CSV parsing with quoted fields, and row-level validation with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks using checklist metadata.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the Web Speech API to provide speech-to-text recording with state for transcript, recording status, errors, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1), and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including dates, species, sex, and string fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with incomplete tasks by writing HTML into a hidden iframe and triggering the browser's native print dialog.
Generates and downloads a CSV file of all surgery cases including remaining tasks, using browser Blob/URL APIs.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Utility functions for formatting dates (bigint nanoseconds), species, sex enums, and task lists into human-readable strings for PDF output.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Utility functions for formatting dates, species, and sex enums into readable strings for CSV report output, mirroring pdfFormatters.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a text query, matching against case fields and incomplete checklist item labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that orders surgery cases by arrival date or number of open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines species/sex option constants and the CaseFormData interface used for surgery case form state.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and date parsing/formatting utilities supporting MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY, and ISO formats, plus bigint nanosecond conversions.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that fetches, filters, sorts, and displays surgery cases in either a calendar or list view, with controls for search, species/task filters, sorting, and PDF export.
A React component that renders a 7-column weekly calendar grid with navigation controls, displaying surgery cases grouped by day using CalendarCaseCard components.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/ca: Utility functions for the weekly calendar including generating week day arrays, filtering cases by day, formatting week range strings, and checking if a week is the current week.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions that extract and count open (remaining) checklist tasks from surgery cases, returning structured OpenTaskItem objects.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: An empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: A generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations, covering user profiles, surgery cases, tasks, dashboard data, and configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light-mode CSS custom properties (design tokens) for colors, borders, and semantic UI variables; dark mode is intentionally kept identical to light mode.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file for the tesseract.js OCR library, defining interfaces for Worker, RecognizeResult, Logger, and enums for PSM and OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended font and border-radius settings, and the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot for a veterinary case management app, tracking implemented features, architectural notes, known issues, and current development focus around dashboard views and task defaults.
